definition.name: Kubernetes Set Context
definition.description: Set the context of a target Kubernetes cluster and export the kubeconfig which is used by subsequent actions
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: method
inputs.description: Acceptable values: kubeconfig or service-account or service-principal

inputs.name: kubeconfig-encoding
inputs.description: Encoding of the kubeconfig input. Accepts "plaintext" (default) or "base64".

inputs.name: context
inputs.description: If your kubeconfig has multiple contexts, use this field to use a specific context, otherwise the default one would be chosen

inputs.name: k8s-secret
inputs.description: Service account secret (run kubectl get serviceaccounts <service-account-name> -o yaml and copy the service-account-secret-name)

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Token extracted from the secret of service account (should be base 64 decoded)
